function createtime() { var grt= new Date("08/2/2020 09:44:00");//æ­¤å¤„ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæœˆ/æ—¥/å¹´ æ—¶:åˆ†:ç§’ï¼‰ now.setTime(now.getTime()+250); days = (now - grt ) / 1000 / 60 / 60 / 24; dnum = Math.floor(days); hours = (now - grt ) / 1000 / 60 / 60 - (24 * dnum); hnum = Math.floor(hours); if(String(hnum).length ==1 ){hnum = "0" + hnum;} minutes = (now - grt ) / 1000 /60 - (24 * 60 * dnum) - (60 * hnum); mnum = Math.floor(minutes); if(String(mnum).length ==1 ){mnum = "0" + mnum;} seconds = (now - grt ) / 1000 - (24 * 60 * 60 * dnum) - (60 * 60 * hnum) - (60 * mnum); snum =
